shibboleth-desc: Provides authentication using Shibboleth in conjunction with PluggableAuth
shibboleth-wg-empty-displayname: The wgShibboleth_DisplayName config is empty in LocalSettings.php
shibboleth-wg-empty-email: The wgShibboleth_Email config is empty in LocalSettings.php
shibboleth-wg-empty-username: The wgShibboleth_Username config is empty in LocalSettings.php
shibboleth-wg-empty-groupmap-attr: A wgShibboleth_GroupMap config is empty in LocalSettings.php
shibboleth-attr-empty-username: Shibboleth: username attribute is not set
